co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

Interface WorkflowSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProgramSpecification, SchedulableProgramSpecification
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultWorkflowSpecification

    public interface WorkflowSpecification
extends SchedulableProgramSpecification
    Specification for a Workflow -- an instance of this class is created by the WorkflowSpecification.Builder class.

    Example WorkflowSpecification for a scheduled workflow: 

        
      @Override
      public WorkflowSpecification configure() {
        return WorkflowSpecification.Builder.with()
        .setName("PurchaseHistoryWorkflow")
        .setDescription("PurchaseHistoryWorkflow description")
        .onlyWith(new PurchaseHistoryBuilder())
        .addSchedule(new Schedule("DailySchedule", "Run every day at 4:00 A.M.", "0 4 * * *", 
                     Schedule.Action.START))
        .build();
      }
    See the Purchase example application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  WorkflowSpecification.Builder
      Builder class for constructing the WorkflowSpecification.
      static interface  WorkflowSpecification.FirstAction<T>
      Builder for adding the first action to the workflow.
      static interface  WorkflowSpecification.MoreAction<T>
      Builder for adding more actions to the workflow.
      static interface  WorkflowSpecification.ScheduleSetter<T>
      Builder for setting up the schedule of the workflow.
      static interface  WorkflowSpecification.SpecificationCreator
      Builder interface for the last stage of building the WorkflowSpecification.
